entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 07:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -40.4°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
